Load libraries and set seed for reproducibility.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(modelr)
library(mgcv)

set.seed(1)
```

# Nonlinear data and CV

```{r}
nonlin_df = 
  tibble(
    id = 1:100,
    x = runif(100, 0, 1),
    y = 1 - 10 * (x - .3) ^ 2 + rnorm(100, 0, .3)
  )

nonlin_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point()
```
